description: RequestReduce.SassLessCoffee is an add-on to RequestReduce which compiles DotLess and Sass CSS as well as Coffee scripts to be included in the RequestDeuce sprite generation, minification and bundling processing. Simply reference your .less, .sass, .scss and .coffee files with those extensions and RequestReduce will compile them before performing its reductions.
releaseNotes:
* Fix @import parsing bug that only recognizes URLsinside of url()
      * fix css link parsing bug not picking up single quoted stylesheet rel
      * Support @font-face rule
      * Upgraded to latest ajax minifier that fixes a bug with gradient transform color hashes
      * Fix parsing errors that surface with empty css comments
      * Fix Nuget Dependency versions
      * Fix flush and dashboard for unauthenticated users on .net 3.5
      * Fix nuget install for Web Site projects
      * Do not inject css before X-UA-Compatible meta tag.
      * Fix errors thrown by setting response filter after a redirect
      * Fix errors thrown by setting response filter without reading it (.net 3.5 bug)
      * Fix bug that surfaces when two identical scripts are in the head
      * Gracefully swallow and log errors in transformations
      * Fix disk file cache failing to load previously cached files on app startup
      * Allow saving of less/sass/coffee files in RequestReduce directory
      * Fix .less imports
summary: An add-on which compiles DotLess and Sass CSS as well as Coffee scripts to be included in the RequestDeuce sprite generation, minification and bundling processing.
